Title: Relates to an annual inventory of short-term rental locations and capacities, and monthly utilization data
Summary: Requires short-term rental companies to provide an annual inventory of short-term rental locations and capacities, and monthly utilization data for each county in the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring short-term rental companies to provide an annual inventory of short-term rental locations and capacities, and monthly utilization data for each county in the state
